name: NuGetPublisher
description: Deprecated: use the “NuGet” task instead. It works with the new Tool Installer framework so you can easily use new versions of NuGet without waiting for a task update, provides better support for authenticated feeds outside this organization/collection, and uses NuGet 4 by default.
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=627417) or [see the NuGet documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/nuget/)
author: Lawrence Gripper

inputs.name: searchPattern
inputs.label: Path/Pattern to nupkg
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pattern to match or path to nupkg files to be uploaded. Multiple patterns can be separated by a semicolon.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: NuGet Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The NuGet server generic service connection, set the key 'Password/Token Key' field to your NuGet API key.

inputs.name: feedName
inputs.label: Internal Feed URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of a NuGet feed hosted in this account.

inputs.name: nuGetAdditionalArgs
inputs.label: NuGet Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments passed to NuGet.exe push. [More Information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/nuget/tools/cli-ref-push).

inputs.name: nuGetVersion
inputs.label: NuGet Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of NuGet to use, or custom version.

inputs.name: nuGetPath
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.exe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to NuGet.exe. Will override version selection.

inputs.name: continueOnEmptyNupkgMatch
inputs.label: Continue if no packages match the "Path/Pattern to nupkg"
inputs.helpMarkDown: Continue instead of fail if no packages match the "Path/Pattern to nupkg".

messages.Warning_NoConfigForOldNuGet: To connect to NuGet feeds hosted in your Azure DevOps organization with NuGet 3.1 or below, edit your build pipeline to specify a path to a NuGet.config containing the package sources you wish to use.
messages.Warning_NoConfigForNoCredentialProvider: To connect to NuGet feeds hosted in your Azure DevOps organization on this build agent, edit your build pipeline to specify a path to a NuGet.config containing the package sources you wish to use.
messages.Warning_ConflictingNuGetPreference: NuGet 3.3 was selected, but a custom NuGet path was provided. The custom path will be preferred. To resolve this warning, edit your build task and select 'custom' for NuGet version under Advanced.
messages.ConnectingAs: Connecting to feeds in your Azure DevOps organization as '%s' [%s]
messages.BuildIdentityPermissionsHint: For internal feeds, make sure the build service identity '%s' [%s] has access to the feed.
messages.NoCredProviderOnAgent: CredentialProvider.TeamBuild.exe not found on the agent. Falling back to config-based credential flow.
messages.NotARegularFile: %s is not a regular file. Check the 'Path/Pattern to nupkg' property of the NuGetPublisher task.
messages.CouldNotFindNuGetService: Could not find the NuGet service. This task will be unable to authenticate to feeds hosted in your Azure DevOps organization.
messages.NoNuGetSpecified: If 'custom' is selected, you must provide a path to NuGet.exe
messages.Error_ApiKeyNotSupported: DotNetCore currently does not support using an encrypted Api Key.
messages.Error_NoMatchingFilesFoundForPattern: No matching files were found with search pattern: %s
messages.Error_NoUrlWasFoundWhichMatches: No download URL was found for %s
messages.Error_NoVersionWasFoundWhichMatches: No version was found which matches the input %s
messages.Info_ExpectBehaviorChangeWhenUsingVersio: You are using a query match on the version string. Behavior changes or breaking changes might occur as NuGet updates to a new version.
messages.Info_MatchingUrlWasFoundSettingAuth: Using authentication information for the following URI:
messages.Info_SavingTempConfig: Saving NuGet.config to a temporary config file.
messages.NGCommon_AreaNotFoundInSps: Unable to locate the '%s' [%s] area. The service containing that area may not be available in your region.
messages.NGCommon_DetectedNuGetExtensionsPath: Detected NuGet extensions loader path (NUGET_EXTENSIONS_PATH environment variable): %s
messages.NGCommon_IgnoringNuGetExtensionsPath: Detected NuGet extensions loader path (NUGET_EXTENSIONS_PATH environment variable). Extensions are ignored when using the built-in NuGet client
messages.NGCommon_NoSourcesFoundInConfig: No package sources were found in the NuGet.config file at %s
messages.NGCommon_NuGetConfigIsPackagesConfig: Expected a NuGet.config file at %s, but its contents appear to be a packages.config. Check the settings for the %s task and confirm you selected NuGet.config rather than packages.config.
messages.NGCommon_RemovingSources: Preparing to set credentials in NuGet.config
messages.NGCommon_SpsNotFound: Unable to find the '%s' [%s] area. There may be a problem with your Team Foundation Server installation.
messages.Warning_UpdatingNuGetVersion: Updating version of NuGet.exe to %s from %s. Behavior changes or breaking changes might occur as NuGet updates to a new version. If this is not desired, uncheck the 'Check for Latest Version' option in the task.
